title: Print, "Elevation geometrale d'un des projets de l'autel de St. Leu de Paris (Design for the Altar of St. Leu of Paris), plate 103, from Oeuvres de Juste-Aurèle Meissonnier (Works by Juste-Aurèle Meissonnier)", 1748
signed: Signed in plate, lower left: J. A. Meissonnier inv.; lower right: Herisset Sculpsit. .
inscribed: Inscribed in plate, upper left: R; upper right: 103; lower centre: Elevation geometrale d'un des projets de l'autel de St. Leu de Paris / A Paris chés Huquier rue St. Jacque au coin de celle des Mathurins. C.P.R.
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Stairs lead up to altar which has six candlesticks flanking a cross; above, in symmetrical form, angels gaze up and down; behind altar a niche decorated with putti. Cupola with clerestory and pairs of putti between windows.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Elevation geometrale d'un des projets de l'autel de St. Leu de Paris (Design for the Altar of St. Leu of Paris), plate 103, from Oeuvres de Juste-Aurèle Meissonnier (Works by Juste-Aurèle Meissonnier)", 1748.
1748. Engraving on white laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-212-62.
